<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bless Shield](/Feats.aspx?ID=3598) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 78

**Archetype** [Lastwall Sentry](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=15)

**Prerequisites**
[Lastwall Sentry Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=882); you worship a good-aligned deity

</column>

---

Your uttered prayers become an aegis, drawing the blessing of your deity across the surface of your shield. Until the beginning of your next turn your shield, any [shield boss](/Weapons.aspx?ID=41), or [shield spikes](/Weapons.aspx?ID=42) gain the effects of a [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune. Additionally, damage you take as a result of an incorporeal creature's Strike can trigger your [Shield Block](/Actions.aspx?ID=1140) reaction, even if the damage isn't physical damage.
name: Bless Shield
prerequisite: Lastwall Sentry Dedication; you worship a good-aligned deity
